nodes.text: Royen was an individual who served as a moff in the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. After the death of Emperor Palpatine at the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Royen's fleet was cut off from Imperial support near the Red Hand Cluster, and as such, became a de facto Imperial remnant. Caern Adan, an agent in the New Republic's Intelligence branch, mentioned the isolation of Royan's fleet during an address to General Hera Syndulla and the New Republic's Alphabet Squadron.
Royen was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
